alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Koolau Windward; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 03 at 3:18PM HST until January 04 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND MAUI FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... .Surf along north facing shores will briefly trend down through the evening hours, then return to advisory levels late tonight through Wednesday as the northwest swell shifts out of a more northerly direction (340-350 degrees). Surf along west facing shores will steadily ease as the swell direction becomes more northerly. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Surf building to 14 to 18 feet. * WHERE...Along north facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Molokai, and Maui. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM HST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
